block.name: Playback
block.doc:
Target ID: Block ID of carrier board.
Block Priority: Specify the priority of the block between all the blocks who have this parameter. It sets the block order to be executed . Priority order starts from 0. For example, the block with priority of 0 will be the first to be executed, then priority 1, then priority 2, etc.
Continuous Playback: When continuous playback is enabled, the samples will playback indefinitely.
Media Type: Allows to switch between PCI Express and Ethernet RTDEX transport when using a Perseus board as a carrier.
Packet Size: Should be configured as a power of two for more efficient processing.
Channel: RTDEX channel to use for loading DDR3 RAM.
